content.raw:
Hello :) Just a small comment...

Did you build `gz3d.js`? This is the file which gets included in the html ;) It normally shows in the diff together with the source files... 

Before running `start_gzweb.sh`, I do it like this:

```
#!bash

cd gz3d/utils
grunt build
cd ../../build
cmake ..
```
content.html:
Hello :) Just a small comment...

Did you build gz3d.js? This is the file which gets included in the html ;) It normally shows in the diff together with the source files...

Before running start_gzweb.sh, I do it like this:

cd gz3d/utils
grunt build
cd ../../build
cmake ..
